promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young legendary rabbit steel-type pokemon holding a metallic sword. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or rabbit. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Swordbunyashi, a a chibi young legendary rabbit steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Destructor Beam. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "rabbit", "steel" or "Swordbunyashi". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, rabbit-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey shadows
generatedDescription: This petite, legendary iron-furred hare is known as the Mountain Miniknight. Its Destructor Beam, a hallmark of its prowess, can pierce boulders.
